card.title: WHAT WE DO
card.subtitle: India celebrates Exploration
card.content:
Indian Media Syndicate strives to be the global leader in Exploration, Scientific Communications, Real Life Entertainment, serving passionate Explorers around the world with scientific journalism that inspires, informs and entertains.

This is an Indian family of informational, educational and entertainment-oriented Television, Applications and Websites offering value to how Education is developed and accessed by Indic Societies.

heading.title: OUR MISSION
heading.subtitle: To Revolutionize Indian Media
heading.content: By making every Information, every Discovery, every Invention, every Challenge accessible to every person in the India pacific Region

card.subtitle: Making Knowledge Accessible to All.
card.content: Each control has been designed for multiple use, several administrators will be able to assign content remotely from their mobile phones, without any worries.

card.title: ABOUT US
card.subtitle: India celebrates Exploration
card.content:
Indian Media Syndicate endeavors to be the global leader in Exploration, Scientific Communications, Real Life Entertainment, serving passionate Explorers around the world generating scientific journalism that inspires, informs and entertains.

This is an Indian family of informational, educational and entertainment-oriented Television, Applications and Websites offering value to how Education is developed and accessed by the world.

card.title: UNITED FOR GOOD
card.subtitle: This is what an explorer looks like
card.content: When you connect with our network, you help further the work of our explorers, and educators around the world.

cardcontentlist: Complimentary subscription to IMS magazines including unlimited digital access, the online archive, exclusive eBooks, and popular streaming films
Annual IMS official Merchandise
Free admission to IMS Events & Seminars for four adults and 2 children under 18 for one year
25% discount on purchases at the IMS Memorabilia Store
Personalized tour of IMS’s headquarters + Film City in Andaman, India for you and your guests
Be the first to know about breaking news on IMS’ discoveries, expeditions, reports, and more through exclusive “Eureka” emails.
Invitations to exclusive “Insider Calls”& 'Backstage Premiere' featuring programmatic updates directly from IMS Explorers and Society staff
Special access to Conferences and special events, including live online streaming of IMS’s annual Explorers Festival
